definitions.text: a collection containing a variety of sorts of things
examples: a great assortment of cars was on display
he had a variety of disorders

definitions.text: a garment made of motley (especially a court jester's costume)
a multicolored woolen fabric woven of mixed threads in 14th to 17th century England
make something more diverse and varied
make motley; color with different colors
consisting of a haphazard assortment of different kinds; ; ; ; ; ; - I.A.Richards
examples: an arrangement of assorted spring flowers
a mixed program of baroque and contemporary music
sundry sciences commonly known as social

definitions.text: having sections or patches colored differently and usually brightly
